topics.body:
I've been thinking about trying to do a story about a fairytale magical girl entering a post apunkalyptic wasteland world, try to be a gaurdian of the people. She would get beaten down alot at first and throughout the whole story it's about the wasteland trying to tear apart her optimism and crush her in depression.

Don't that sounds like FUN kids!?
